about_the_game:
[Synopsis]

Early one morning at a certain shrine...
there was one shrine maiden, oh so bored with her daily chores.
There, a child from the nearby village comes in search of help!
"Oneechan HELP! All the villagers have gone crazy..."
"Possessed villagers? Perfect. Leave everything up to Kanna, okay!"
"Eh... no, I mean, the priest, I want..."

Having gained an excuse to abandon her chores,
shrine maiden Kanna throws her broom aside.
"I'll go an smack some sense into the fools."
"...... Don't go too overboard please......"

[Game System]

- Various actions are possible; standing attack, flying attack,
dash attack, grappling throws, emergency escape, etc!
- Taking too much damage results in clothing removal (7 stages of)
- After a certain level of clothing has been removed erotic attacks ensue.
- Contains a enemy defeating VS mode.
- Unlimited Continues. Can start from any previously reached stage.

4 stages / 21 enemies / 6 types of sexual harassment
16 types of erotic scenes (pixel art animation)

Sexual harassment is mainly breasts
Erotic scenes are mainly orthodox sexual positions

Battle cries / moan and groans of pleasure are voiced.

content_descriptors.notes:
This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work . The game contains Nudity or Sexual Content, Frequent Violence, sexual assault, non-consensual sex, General Mature Content.
All characters are over the age of 20.

name: Shrine Maiden Kanna's Meatheaded ExorFist Record

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: WIN10/XP
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: WIN10/XP
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: A Pixel Art Beat 'em up Scrolling Action Game. This hot-blooded meathead shrine maiden, by the name of Kanna, will resolve all problems standing in her way... with her MIGHT! Defeat waves of enemies with her M(uscular)ystical Miko Powers!
